lexUnit.name: bag.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a (flexible) container, which may have an open top, for carrying one's belongings

sentence.text: I ran a fragrant bath through muslin bags of mint and lavender and flung my clothes onto a chair eager to get in .

The old man went on his way , and I put my bag on a supermarket trolley and wheeled it off to look for Mr Coary .

Placing her bag on the table , she halted beside him as she looked vaguely round for a mug .

As she passed the new couple her beach bag caught the Factor 15 and knocked it off the table .
